thread.title: Princess Charlotte is ‘very lady-like’ and Prince George is ‘very lively,’ Prince William says
thread.title_full: Princess Charlotte is ‘very lady-like’ and Prince George is ‘very lively,’ Prince William says

author: contact@inrumor.com
title: Princess Charlotte is ‘very lady-like’ and Prince George is ‘very lively,’ Prince William says
text:
The Duke of Cambridge opened up about his and the Duchess’ children during a visit to St. John’s College at Cambridge University where he opened a new archive center. 
HRH Duchess of Cambridge 
Prince William took a ten-week course in agricultural management last year at the University of Cambridge. 
“Yesterday The Duke of Cambridge returned to @stjohnscam to open a new, state-of-the-art Archive Centre, ” Kensington Palace tweed alongside some photos of Prince William during his visit. Yesterday The Duke of Cambridge returned to @stjohnscam to open a new, state-of-the-art Archive Centre pic.twitter.com/GJAFEQuSIZ 
— Kensington Palace (@KensingtonRoyal) October 16, 2015 
The royal father-of-two, 33, spoke with Professor Christopher Dobson, the Master of St John’s College, about his and Kate 
Middleton’s adorable children, Princess Charlotte, 5 months, and Prince George, 2, who talked with the journalists after the event. 
“He said George is very lively and Charlotte is very lady-like. He said they were both delightful of course,” Dobson said . 
Previously, the royal talked about fatherhood, saying that “it has been fantastic” and that Charlotte has been a “little joy of heaven,” in an interview with Sky News in July. 
“At the same time it is more responsibility, looking after two little ones, especially when George is around. He’s a little monkey,” he added. 
The Duke of Cambridge also expressed his deep admiration for his “missus,” Duchess Kate, saying that “Catherine has been doing an amazing job as a mother and I’m very proud of her.” 
William would also love if Charlotte and George became Aston Villa fans. While the Duke is an Aston Villa supporter, his grandmother the Queen and his brother Prince Harry are Arsenal fans. Spread the rumor
